title: Carrot & pecan cake with cream cheese frosting

ingredients.item: 200ml sunflower oil, plus extra for greasing
3 Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Eggs
1 tsp ground cinnamon, plus extra to decorate
400g tub Waitrose Cooks’ Ingredients Cream Cheese Frosting

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 170ºC, gas mark 3. Grease and line a deep 20cm cake tin.

In a large mixing bowl, using electric beaters, beat together the oil, sugar and eggs until well combined. Using a spatula, fold in the flour, bicarbonate of soda, cinnamon and ginger, plus a good pinch of salt, until combined. Fold in the carrot, 75g pecans and the raisins. Tip into the tin and bake for 55-60 minutes, or until a skewer inserted into the centre comes out clean. Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
Halve the cake to create 2 layers. Sandwich with ½ the frosting; spread the other ½ on top. Sprinkle over the extra cinnamon and reserved pecans.
